English: Flag of Lousiana
ᏣᎳᎩ: ᎷᏫᏏᎡᎾ ᎦᏓᏘ
Français : Drapeau de la Louisiane
Français cadien: Flag de la Louisiane
Español: Bandera de Luisiana
Hawaiʻi: Ka hae Luikiana
Latina: Vexillum Ludovicianae
Nederlands: Vlag van Louisiana
Diné bizaad: Liwíízíʼeenah Hahoodzo bidah naatʼaʼí
Deitsch: Fahne von Louisiana
Русский: Флаг Луизианы
Српски / srpski: Zastava američke savezne države Lousiane

English: For more information, see:
  • Louisiana adds blood drops to state flag
  • New Louisiana state flag with bleeding pelican is unfurled

current07:12, 22 January 2013990 × 630 (224 KB)Zscout370 (talk | contribs)Done with all edits for the night, but blood is fixed, the entire scroll is done.
06:34, 22 January 2013990 × 630 (231 KB)Zscout370 (talk | contribs)Worked on that font, which is hand drawn. Also resized the flag and the crest to the official proportions.
06:58, 28 June 20111,440 × 932 (181 KB)Zscout370 (talk | contribs)Now this is how you do a proper trace (the SoS office has vector files, but refuses to release them due to reasons of modification)
06:46, 28 June 2011900 × 600 (135 KB)Zscout370 (talk | contribs)Reverted to version as of 07:34, 23 November 2010 (JPEG put into SVG code)
06:20, 28 June 20111,023 × 657 (161 KB)LouisianaFan~commonswiki (talk | contribs)New version of the flag, traced in Inkscape. If this is insufficient, please DO NOT REVERT IT to the obsolete version. Instead, please use the current flag and make a better SVG.

04:57, 16 November 2006900 × 600 (135 KB)Hoshie (talk | contribs){{en|This is the flag of Louisiana, from the xrmap flag collection 2.7. On 25 May 2006, a bill was approved in Louisiana that would add three drops of blood to the flag and the state seal. The three drops symbolise what the mother pelican
